title: Free Healthcare for Veterans: What VA Medical Benefits Cover (and What They Donâ€™t)
summary: Eligible veterans may receive free or low-cost healthcare through the VA, including hospital care, mental health services, and prescriptions. Hereâ€™s how to qualify and enroll.

body.raw:
## Introduction The VA provides comprehensive **medical, mental health, and wellness services** to millions of veterans. If you served, you may be eligible for **free or low-cost healthcare** â€” even without other insurance. *** ## Who Qualifies for VA Health Care? You may qualify if you: - Served **active duty** and didnâ€™t receive a dishonorable discharge - Are a **combat veteran (post-9/11)** â€” covered for 10 years - Are **low-income or receive VA disability compensation** - Were **exposed to burn pits, Agent Orange, or toxins** > ðŸ’¡ There is **no income requirement** for most service-connected care. ## What Services Are Covered? - **Primary care, urgent care, and emergency services** - **Mental health counseling** (including PTSD and suicide prevention) - **Addiction treatment** - **Prescriptions and lab tests** - **Specialty care and surgeries** - **Hearing aids and vision services** ## Whatâ€™s Not Covered? - Cosmetic procedures - Experimental treatments - Long-term custodial care (unless service-connected) If you're dealing with PTSD, depression, or other service-related mental health issues, you can also [access 24/7 crisis support, housing help, and emergency grants](./veteran-crisis-support-free-hotlines-grants-and-emergency-help) through veteran-specific aid programs. ## How to Enroll 1. Apply online at [VA.gov](https://www.va.gov/health-care/apply/application) 2. Submit DD-214, income info (if needed), and insurance cards (if any) 3. Get assigned to a VA medical center and primary care provider > ðŸ’¡ Veterans can now get **urgent care at participating civilian clinics** with no copay, under expanded Community Care rules. *** ###### References
VA Health Care Benefits Overview
VA Eligibility Criteria
Apply for VA Health Care
